original_text: Therefore, anyone who rejects this instruction does not reject a human being but God, the very God who gives you his Holy Spirit.
korean_text: 그러므로 저버리는 자는 사람을 저버림이 아니요 너희에게 그의 성령을 주신 하나님을 저버림이니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore, anyone who rejects this instruction
does not reject a human being

sentences.korean_translation: 하나님, 바로 그 하나님을 거절하는 것이다

sentences.original_text: who gives you his Holy Spirit
